CyborgChatter.Chatter_1: {Bartender} said I reminded him of a certain "EV2". Perhaps I should meet her.

CyborgSpecialText.Graveyard1: Fascinating. This appears to be a storage unit for broken and malfunctioning humans.
CyborgSpecialText.Graveyard2: My sensors indicate an increased density of energy particles. My visual receptors are unable to identify any of them.
CyborgSpecialText.Party: This party is going to be nuts, maybe even bolts!
CyborgSpecialText.Rain1: Precipitation detected. Advising self to seek shelter. Rust imminent.
CyborgSpecialText.Rain2: Flash flood warning. Error 404: Sandbags not found.
CyborgSpecialText.Storm1: BEEP! Severe weather warning. This is not a test. Take shelter, immediately. BEEP!
CyborgSpecialText.Storm2: Abnormal levels of negative and positive charged particles detected.
CyborgSpecialText.Windy1: Sensors indicate strong shifts in barometric pressure. Caution is advised.
CyborgSpecialText.Windy2: A strong contrast between high and low pressure detected.

TownNPCMood_Cyborg.Content: All neural functions appear to be operating smoothly.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.DislikeBiome: The flora and fauna are invading my synthetic exoskeleton: {BiomeName} is an undesired location for myself.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.DislikeCrowded: Too many other lifeforms. I am experiencing negative emotional neural patterns.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.DislikeNPC: {NPCName} does not comprehend my existence, for it deviates from the norm. Unusual. The negative feeling is mutual.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.FarFromHome: I have wandered beyond the signal range of my datacenter.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.HateBiome: Detecting overwhelming numbers of hostile life signatures in {BiomeName}.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.HateCrowded: Lifeform limit exceeded. Neural functions overloaded. Translation: I hate this.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.HateNPC: {NPCName}'s functions cannot be scientifically analyzed. Neutral functions overloaded. Translation: I hate this.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.LikeBiome: My cybernetic functions perform optimally in {BiomeName}'s temperature gradient. This is a plus.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.LikeNPC: {NPCName} attempts to treat me favorably like another human. It appears I appreciate that.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.LikeNPC_Princess: {NPCName} analyzed: Most wholesome carbon lifeform ever recorded.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.LoveSpace: Zero close proximity life signs detected. This is fortunate.
